tags: i can't stop thinking about it and it's been a month
summary: nothing gets me more excited than the scene where the avengers & guardians are beating the fuck out of thanos on titan. it’s the...
body:
nothing gets me more excited than the scene where the avengers & guardians are beating the fuck out of thanos on titan. it’s the perfect comic book scene. so perfect that when i was watching it i was feeling 300% emotion simultaneously. 100% holy fucking fuck this is the most bad ass thing i’ve ever seen in my life. 100% oh my god what’s happening i’m going to have a panic attack bc someone might get killed right here. and 100% pls kick this motherfucker’s ass. 

the most perfect lines included.

“oh yeah, you’re much more of a thanos.”

whispering “don’t let him close his fist.”


then quill jumping on stephen’s magic platforms. “Boom!” as he dives into a portal while flipping thanos off.

“magic with a kick!” as peter jumps through portals.

then when peter is holding one arm with webs, stephen holding the other with magical ropes, tony trying to pull the gauntlet off and mantis popping out of a portal and landing on thanos’s head to knock a bitch out.

like wtf my brain didn’t know how to comprehend the sheer thrill of what i was seeing

summary: New Avengers 4 Synopsis
title: New Avengers 4 Synopsis
body:
New Avengers 4 Synopsis

Okay this is a little vague but there’s a synopsis for Avengers 4. Suspiciously it’s disappeared from License Global, but here it is anyway.

“A culmination of 22 interconnected films the fourth installment of the Avengerssaga will draw audiences to witness the turning point of this epic journey. Our beloved heroes will truly understand how fragile this reality is and the sacrifices that must be…

View On WordPress

summary: Avengers: Infinity War theory
body:
Avengers: Infinity War theory

Sooo i think thanos did not kill half the universe but maybe used the reality stone and made two universes. One half lives in the old universe and the other half in the new universe.

Back than he didn’t have the power and had to kill half the population of a planet but now he has and his goal was a better life for everyone so maybe everyone will have a better life just in different universes.

summary: Archaic Kinds Of Fun
title: Archaic Kinds Of Fun
body:
What’s the most impossible job you can think of? For Jo Holbrook, The Tank, Killer Extradonaire…it’s being a bodyguard. Leave it to Fury to kick it up a notch. Now she’s playing chauffeur for Tony Stark and trying to figure out where her life went wrong. At least there’s pancakes.

For The Record

November 1, 2014DARCY“Yo, Skye! You in here?!” Darcy called out as she walked into Tony’s lab. She heard music, and she knew Tony wasn’t playing it because he was out on a date with Pepper…

Read more…

summary: It’s true what they say about the world ENDING -It goes not with a B A N G but with a whisper.   We’ve all lost something,...
caption:
It’s true what they say about the world ENDING -It goes not with a B A N G but with a whisper.

 We’ve all lost something, someone, some part of ourselves that feels impossible to get back.  How can the earth keep turning without the missing?And somewhere, deep within the recesses of the Soul Stone, lies a secret world, a pocket dimension where those who turned to ash in the Snap went.  Two parallel worlds hang in the balance as those trapped inside yearn to break free, and those on the outside search in desperation to break in.  Are you strong enough to join in the fight for not just one dimension, but two? Do you have what it takes to escape an infinity stone?

Main✦Plot✦Characters✦Rules✦Questions

tags: I LOVE THEM AND MARVEL SO MUCH I'M SOBBING
summary: I love that Tony is Peter’s father figure, considering how Peter lost his at a young age and that Tony felt like he never had a...
body:
I love that Tony is Peter’s father figure, considering how Peter lost his at a young age and that Tony felt like he never had a father who was there for him. I just really appreciate their relationship, and how much Tony cares for him.

It’s repeatedly shown that Tony cares for and loves Peter, even before they met. Tony was already watching footage of Peter and creating tech for him, as mentioned on some other Tumblr post on here. 

The way he talks with him sounds like a dad lecturing his son, especially in Spider-man Homecoming when he tells Peter that he wanted him to be better than him. Tony doesn’t just lecture him only though, oh no, he actually treats Peter like an equal and listens to what he has to say. 

There’s so much more I could ramble on about, but I think that this father-son like relationship is what Tony needs. I don’t care what anyone says, I will always consider Peter to be Tony Stark’s spiderling “son” (Peter does still have Aunt May as his family and I’d rather not write her off, bless her sweet heart).

It’s repeatedly shown that Tony cares for and loves Peter, even before they met. Tony was already watching footage of Peter and creating tech for him, as mentioned on some other Tumblr post on here. 

The way he talks with him sounds like a dad lecturing his son, especially in Spider-man Homecoming when he tells Peter that he wanted him to be better than him. Tony doesn’t just lecture him only though, oh no, he actually treats Peter like an equal and listens to what he has to say.

summary:
Tony: Well as you know, your pardons-
[Crash]
Happy: Crap, i knew i forgot something
Tony: Happy, please tell me you didn't...
body:
Tony: Well as you know, your pardons-

[Crash]

Happy: Crap, i knew i forgot something

Tony: Happy, please tell me you didn’t forgot to pick up the kid so he drove himself here in the brand new car I just gave him and just crashed it behind me

Happy: Well, you *did* taught him how to drive

Tony: God dammit, May is gonna kill all three of us

summary: So because Russos said that spiderman 2 will start minutes after the end of Avengers 4- I'm definitely proposing that Avengers 4...
body: So because Russos said that spiderman 2 will start minutes after the end of Avengers 4- I’m definitely proposing that Avengers 4 will end with the Avengers having just done something to turn back what Thanos did so every one is starting to come back and the movie will end. Then Spiderman 2 will start and it’ll begin with Peter coming back or just having come alive again. This means we’ll see him have to cope with the PTSD of what happened to him (really hope this is addressed) and his reunions with everyone (PLEASE LET US SEE HIS REUNION WITH TONY PLEASE)
